t: Brand Referral Bonus (BRB) : a new program for Amazon sellers! | PixelMe Blog
s: The Brand Referral Bonus is an opportunity to earn a bonus for product sales driven by non-Amazon marketing efforts that are measured by Amazon Attribution. With BRB, you can earn a bonus averaging 10% of product sales to be credited toward your referral fees on a monthly basis.

t: What is a Brand Referral Bonus (BRB) and how do you get it?
s: How do you get the BRB? You must be registered as a brand owner selling in the United States on Amazon. In order to become registered as a brand, you will need to have an active registered trademark and then apply through Amazon to be a brand owner. Resellers are not eligible for this bonus.

t: Brand Registry and the Brand Referral Bonus program
s: October 14, 2024 - The Amazon Brand Referral Bonus program provides incentives to Brand-Registered sellers. Amazon offers a referral bonus for each sale generated through a unique referral link.
